title: Inflation in U.S. Builds With Biggest Gain in Prices Since 1990
itunes:title: Inflation in U.S. Builds With Biggest Gain in Prices Since 1990
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence Chief U.S. Interest Rate Strategist Ira Jersey discusses CPI data and inflation concerns. Gregory Zuckerman, author of A “Shot to Save the World: The Inside Story of the Life-or-Death Race for a COVID-19 Vaccine” shares his thoughts the Pfizer Covid pill. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Aerospace Reporter Julie Johnsson break down Julie's Businessweek Magazine story Boeing, Airbus Launch Cargo Planes That May Face Crowded Skies. Bloomberg News West Coast Correspondent Ed Ludlow has news on Rivian's trading debut after a blockbuster $11.9 billion IPO. And We Drive to the Close with Anu Gaggar, Global Investment Strategist for Commonwealth Financial Network.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
